page.description: Compares two values. Returns 0 if they are equal, 1 if the second value is greater, -1 if the first value is greater.
page.prototype: .Compare as N (one as C, two as C)

argument.name: one
argument.description: The first value to compare, defined as a character string.

argument.name: two
argument.description: The second value to compare defined as a character string.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns a value of -1, 0, or 1 depending on the result of the comparison as described below:

item.description: Second parameter *[xb:two]* is greater than the first parameter *[xb:one]*.
First parameter *[xb:one]* is greater than the second parameter *[xb:two]*.
